function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious and infectious diseases spreading through close contact","Impact":"Risk of rapid disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene and sanitation measures, and promote social distancing","Technologies":"Use of contact tracing and monitoring technology to identify and isolate potential cases","People":"General population, especially those in crowded or high-traffic areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate data cleaning and filtering leading to incorrect analysis","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement robust data cleaning protocols and validation processes, and utilize advanced text processing algorithms","Technologies":"Natural Language Processing (NLP) tools and data validation software","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and data processing teams","Owner":"Data analysis and research teams, technology managers"},{"Description":"Failure to identify statistical differences in disease prevalence between countries and regions","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of disease spread and unequal distribution of resources","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough statistical analysis using appropriate tests and controls for confounding variables","Technologies":"Statistical software and tools for hypothesis testing and data visualization","People":"Epidemiologists, statisticians, and public health researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"}]}
